decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s): Proposed Basement Plan P630-CAL-XX-B1-DR-A-04001 rev A, Proposed Ground Floor Plan Dwg. P630-CAL-XX-00-DR-A-04002 rev A, Proposed Mezzanine Floor Plan P630-CAL-XX-MZ-DR-A-04003 rev A, Proposed 1st and 12th Floor Plan P630-CAL-XX-01-DR-A-04004 rev A, Proposed 13th Floor Plan P630-CAL-XX-13-DR-A-04016 rev A, Proposed 14th and 15th Floor Plan P630-CAL-XX-14-DR-A-04017 rev A, Proposed 16th to 18th Floor Plan P630-CAL-XX-16-DR-A-04019 rev A, Proposed Roof Plan P630-CAL-XX-RF-DR-A-04022 rev A, Proposed Section AA P630-CAL-XX-ZZ-DR-A-06001 rev A, Design and Access Statement dated 16.11.2023.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow  amendment outlines the changes to the project to enhance the buildings safety and improving its functionality and design in relation to planning permission reference  202231FUL dated 23/12/2020 for 'Construction of a building with a basement level, part double-height ground floor with part mezzanine floor and 18 and 12 floors above with roof plant and communal roof garden to accommodate two flexible-use units at ground floor (A1/A2/A3/D1 or D2 use classes) and 144 residential units (100% affordable) on the upper floors (mezzanine to 18th floor) with associated cycle and bin stores, substation, private and communal amenity space and alterations to the highway (following demolition of existing buildings on site).'
